import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Home() { const [status, setStatus] = useState("Connecting..."); useEffect(() => { fetch("/api/ping") .then((res) => res.text()) .then((txt) => setStatus(txt)) .catch(() => setStatus("Connection failed")); }, []); const Card = ({ title, subtitle }) => (
{title}
{subtitle}
); return (

Default landing page • Status: {status}

Tools & Pages

Choose a tool or page to continue. (Features will be added in the next steps.)

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Mark 0.2
); }
